snippet.title: Peace, Death! Trailer [ENG]
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/588690
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cc.peacedeath.peacedeath
https://itunes.apple.com/ru/app/peace-death/id1249864455
Peace, Death! is an arcade simulator with difficulties. In this game you play as the Reaper working for your boss, Death, and send clients to Heaven, Hell, or Purgatory.
